resources.string: How can I set the permissions? Can I disallow the permissions?
How to keep my information secure?
Failed to get the Privacy Policy.

To provide you with a better user experience, %1$s may apply for the following permissions in specific scenarios. Errors may occur during setting permissions due to device differences. You can also set permissions in the phone settings.
%s application requires you the following permissions
• The above permissions will only be used after authorization

• The above permissions will only be used when you go to the application permission settings to open the permissions;\n• You can also choose to open the permissions in the APP settings->Privacy permission settings
• All of the above are unknown permissions, please ensure that the application permissions are configured correctly
Failed to obtain the following permissions

You can choose:
1. Click "Settings"
2. Open permissions in APP settings -> Privacy permission settings 
3. Application management -> Corresponding applications -> Permission management open permissions
The following permissions are not configured for application packaging:\n%s\nPlease check whether the application permissions are configured correctly!
The product packaging has been turned on forbidden permission, please check whether the configuration is correct!
The product packaging has opened the banned part of the permission, please check whether the configuration is correct!
Please check whether the parameters are passed in according to the standard, and check whether there is any incoming initialization data!
Preconditions not met, unable to execute permission request
The currently passed in permissions include one or more special permissions, please check whether the data is wrong!
The current incoming permission is not a special permission. Please check if the data is incorrect!
The current permission requires parameters. Please check if the parameters are empty!
Permission application failed, you have refused to apply for permission!
Permission application failed, all are unknown permissions, please check whether permissions are configured!
There are permissions that are disabled by the product, please check whether the packaging configuration is correct!
